content: the swifter swiffer cover created by jen ryan aka knots of rainbows you are free to use the pattern as you see fit and sell all items made from the pattern however please do not claim the pattern as your own if sharing the pattern please give me credit materials needed 1 skein peaches and cream cotton or 2 oz of worsted weight cotton h 5 00mm crochet hook yarn needle guage 16 half_double_crochet across = 5 finished product is approx 10 x 5 5 terms used chain = chain st = stitch yo = yarn over half_double_crochet = half_double_crochet hdc2tog = half_double_crochet 2 together bs = bobble stitch fo = finish off slip_stitch = slip_stitch single_crochet = single_crochet special stitches bobble stitch *yo insert hook in st yo pull up loop yo pull through first two loops on hook* repeat two more times yo and pull through all remaining 4 loops on hook pattern note ch2 does not count as first stitch turn after each row chain 18 r1 half_double_crochet in 3rd chain from hook half_double_crochet in next 15 sts 16hdc r2 chain 2 half_double_crochet in each st across 16hdc r3 repeat row 2 r4 repeat row 2 r5 repeat row 2 r6 repeat row 2 r7 chain 2 half_double_crochet in next 7 st 2hdc in next half_double_crochet in last 8 sts 17hdc r8 chain 1 single_crochet in first 2 st bs in next *single_crochet bs* repeat from * to * 5 times single_crochet in last 2 sts 17sts with 7 bobbles r9 chain 1 single_crochet in each st across 17sc r10 chain 1 *single_crochet bs* repeat from * to * 7 times single_crochet in last 17sts with 8 bobbles r11 repeat row 9 r12 35 repeat row 8 11 six times r36 repeat row 8 r37 chain 2 half_double_crochet in next 7 st hdc2tog half_double_crochet in next 8st 16 half_double_crochet r38 ch2 half_double_crochet in each st across 16hdc r39 repeat row 38 r40 repeat row 38 r41 repeat row 38 r42 repeat row 38 r43 repeat row 38 fo finishing your swiffer cover 1 fold half_double_crochet flaps against the wrong side of the bobble portion 2 attach yarn at fold and slip_stitch to end of flap single_crochet across the side of the bobble portion slip_stitch across next flap fo 3 repeat step 2 on next side 4 weave in ends please contact me at knotsofrainbows@gmail com or on ravelry username jennifercalling with any questions
